status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b9dun","text":"To purify mCherry-tagged ATG13 IDR, fuse the coding sequence for ATG13 (190-517aa) or ATG13 (230-517aa) to a N-terminal 6xHis-TEV-mCherry-tag through cloning into a pET-DUET1 vector (plasmids available from Addgene). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"42pbe","text":"After the transformation of the pET-DUET1 vectors encoding the mCherry-tagged ATG13 IDR in E. coli Rosetta pLysS cells (Novagen Cat# 70956-4), grow the cells in 2x Tryptone Yeast extract (TY) medium at   until an OD600 of 0.4 and then continue at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":215,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":202,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":247,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8u2nr","text":"Once the cells reaches an OD600 of 0.8, induce the protein expression with   isopropyl β-D-1-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG) for   at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sub","offset":28,"length":3}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":75,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":126,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":131,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bbuuq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"concentration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"concentration":"100","error_concentration":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":29}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":57600,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9DF4FE0439EC11EFBA840A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"18","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2v42p","text":"Collect cells by centrifugation and resuspend in lysis buffer.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"71oo6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"j2t4","text":"Lysis buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d4jqp","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1n0dr","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"elim2","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","10_0":"","10_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":"","5_0":"","5_1":"","6_0":"","6_1":"","7_0":"","7_1":"","8_0":"","8_1":"","9_0":"","9_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["236","236"],"data":[["Tris-HCl pH 7.4","50 mM"],["pH","7.4"],["NaCl","300 mM"],["MgCl2","2 mM"],["glycerol","5%"],["Triton X-100","1%"],["Imidazole","10 mM"],["β-mercaptoethanol","2 mM"],["cOmplete EDTA-free protease inhibitors (Roche)",""],["CIP protease inhibitor (Sigma)",""],["DNase (Sigma)",""]],"guid":"351C2CE94F7E47C5955F2597A0768939","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{"A_10":[2,1],"A_11":[2,1],"A_9":[2,1]},"printData":[["Tris-HCl pH 7.4","50 mM"],["pH","7.4"],["NaCl","300 mM"],["MgCl2","2 mM"],["glycerol","5%"],["Triton X-100","1%"],["Imidazole","10 mM"],["β-mercaptoethanol","2 mM"],["cOmplete EDTA-free protease inhibitors (Roche)",""],["CIP protease inhibitor (Sigma)",""],["DNase (Sigma)",""]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4c3nc","text":"Clear the lysates by centrifugation at   in a SORVAL RC6+ centrifuge with an F21S-8x50Y rotor (Thermo Scientific). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"centrifuge","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"centrifuge":"18000","duration":2700,"error_centrifuge":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"scientificNotation":{"centrifuge":false,"temperature":false},"start":null,"temperature":"4","temperatureUnit":10,"unit":33}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7l4iq","text":"Filter the supernatant through an 0.45 µm filter and load onto a pre-equilibrated   His-Trap HP column (Cytiva). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":82,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8hmmj","text":"After His-tagged proteins are bound to the column, wash the column with three column volumes of wash buffer.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ee45q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8b6kf","text":"Wash buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aunq0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"54b8t","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2ovuf","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":"","4_0":"","4_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["162",100],"data":[["Tris-HCl pH 7.4","50 mM"],["NaCl","300 mM"],["Imidazole","10 mM"],["β-mercaptoethanol","2 mM"]],"guid":"B3B180348D804BBD8419D0F1EE226ACD","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Tris-HCl pH 7.4","50 mM"],["NaCl","300 mM"],["Imidazole","10 mM"],["β-mercaptoethanol","2 mM"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23,23]}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"17ebt","text":"Elute the proteins with a stepwise imidazole gradient (30, 75, 100, 150, 225, 300 mM). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"babtu","text":"Pool the fractions containing the 6xHis-TEV-mCherry-ATG13 IDR, concentrated using a 30 kDa cut-off Amicon filter (Merck Millipore). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9tf59","text":"Load the samples were ed onto a pre-equilibrated Superose 200 Increase 10/300 GL column (Cytiva). Elute the proteins with SEC buffer (25 mM Tris-HCl pH 7.4, 150 mM NaCl, 1 mM DTT).  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5c2o2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"jmfk","text":"SEC Buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"499l2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8bdpi","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cl8hg","text":" ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"tables","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"cellsMeta":{"0_0":"","0_1":"","1_0":"","1_1":"","2_0":"","2_1":"","3_0":"","3_1":""},"colTitles":["",""],"colWidths":["145.98843383789062",100],"data":[["Tris-HCl pH 7.4","25 mM"],["NaCl","150 mM"],["DTT","1 mM"]],"guid":"650FAFA796A3436E9C8B4494932EAF49","isJexcelDataFormat":true,"legend":"","mergeCells":{},"printData":[["Tris-HCl pH 7.4","25 mM"],["NaCl","150 mM"],["DTT","1 mM"]],"rowHeights":[23,23,23]}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"f3sp3","text":"Analyze the fractions by SDS-PAGE and Coomassie staining. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3kcpm","text":"Pool the fractions containing purified ATG13 IDR. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"alf64","text":"After concentrating the purified protein, aliquote the protein and snap-frozen in liquid nitrogen. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
